snippet: Senator Tim Johnson of South Dakota said now supports same-sex marriage rights as some Democrats in his state urge his son to run for his seat in 2014.
abstract: Senator Tim Johnson of South Dakota said now supports same-sex marriage rights as some Democrats in his state urge his son to run for his seat in 2014.

headline.main: South Dakotan Is Latest Senate Democrat to Back Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
